name: A Dance of Sand and Water
name_original: A Dance of Sand and Water
description:
A small Visual Novel / Adventure game where you explore a world filled with weird characters on a quest to restore the balance of nature !

Alternate between exploration phases where you can move around on an entire planet and have to dodge enemies, and dialog phases where you will make progress in your quest !

Word is, there could even be more...
